cells.data:
-- comparing :: (a -> b) -> (a -> a -> Ordering)
on comparing(f)
    script
        on |位|(a, b)
            tell mReturn(f)
                set fa to |位|(a)
                set fb to |位|(b)
                if fa < fb then
                    -1
                else if fa > fb then
                    1
                else
                    0
                end if
            end tell
        end |位|
    end script
end comparing
